body_html:
Can you try installing via pip install tensorflow-gpu

I seem to recall that the nightly build I used threw this error even though the DLL was there and set up correctly. Installing straight from pip solved this issue. Uninstall the current version first.
body_text:
Can you try installing via pip install tensorflow-gpu
I seem to recall that the nightly build I used threw this error even though the DLL was there and set up correctly. Installing straight from pip solved this issue. Uninstall the current version first.
body:
Can you try installing via pip install tensorflow-gpu

I seem to recall that the nightly build I used threw this error even though the DLL was there and set up correctly. Installing straight from pip solved this issue. Uninstall the current version first.
